participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and friendly, always eager to connect with others despite personal challenges.
participant_1.background: I take vitamin c when i have a cold. My friend once bought me a car. My favorite season is winter. I am disabled and cannot walk.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, excited about new experiences and making friends.
participant_2.background: I live with my parents and my little brother. I am in 3rd grade. I am a french girl, but I moved to the us last year. I like to play soccer, draw and read asterix. I don t have too many friends in the us yet, but i am going to summer camp and i hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends as soccer in the fall.

content.text: Hey! I'm (user 1's name). What's your name?
Hi! I'm (user 2's name). Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! Where are you from?
I'm from France, but I moved to the US last year.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to go to France. What's it like there?
It's beautiful! The food is amazing, and the people are so friendly.
That sounds amazing! I'm glad you like it here in the US.
I do! It's a great country.
What's your favorite thing to do in the US?
I love to play soccer. I also like to draw and read books.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to play soccer too.
Oh, cool! Do you play on a team?
I used to, but I can't anymore because of my disability.
Oh, that's too bad.
Yeah, but I still like to play sometimes.
That's great!
So, what do you like to do in the summer?
I like to go to summer camp. I also like to go swimming and play outside.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go swimming too.
Oh, cool! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too!
